Package pl.put.poznan.sortingmadness.logic

Class ChooseSorter

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.put.poznan.sortingmadness.logic.ChooseSorter
  • public class ChooseSorter
extends Object
    Context class for Sorter strategy. Sets appropriate strategy and executes sorting.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Wiktor Koropczuk

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  ChooseSorter.EmptyInputException
      Exception thrown when list to sort is empty.
      static class  ChooseSorter.NoSorterProvided
      Exception thrown when sorting is executed without setting sorter.

      • setAuto

        public <E extends Comparable<E>> void setAuto​(List<E> unsorted_list,
                                              boolean ascending)
        Method automatically setting Sorter based on how much the data is sorted for SimpleSorting.
        Type Parameters:
        E - self Comparable object.
        Parameters:
        unsorted_list - list to be sorted.
        ascending - specifies direction of sorting if true then ascending else descending.

      • setAuto

        public void setAuto​(List<org.json.JSONObject> unsorted_list,
                    JSONComparator comparator,
                    boolean ascending)
        Method automatically setting Sorter based on how much the data is sorted for ObjectSorting.
        Parameters:
        unsorted_list - list to be sorted.
        ascending - specifies direction of sorting if true then ascending else descending.
        comparator - comparator used for comparing of JSONObjects.

      • executeSort

        public <E extends Comparable<E>> long executeSort​(List<E> unsorted_list,
                                                  int max_it,
                                                  boolean ascending)
                                           throws ChooseSorter.EmptyInputException,
                                                  ChooseSorter.NoSorterProvided
        Method executing sorting for Comparable objects and measuring elapsed time in nanoseconds.
        Type Parameters:
        E - self Comparable object.
        Parameters:
        unsorted_list - list to be sorted.
        max_it - maximum number of iterations.
        ascending - specifies direction of sorting if true then ascending else descending.
        Returns:
        elapsed time in nanoseconds.
        Throws:
        ChooseSorter.EmptyInputException - thrown when unsorted_list is empty.
        ChooseSorter.NoSorterProvided - thrown when Sorter wasn't set before executing this method.

      • executeSort

        public long executeSort​(List<org.json.JSONObject> unsorted_list,
                        int max_it,
                        boolean ascending,
                        JSONComparator comparator)
                 throws ChooseSorter.EmptyInputException,
                        ChooseSorter.NoSorterProvided
        Method executing sorting for Comparable objects and measuring elapsed time in nanoseconds.
        Parameters:
        unsorted_list - list to be sorted.
        max_it - maximum number of iterations.
        ascending - specifies direction of sorting if true then ascending else descending.
        comparator - comparator used for comparing of JSONObjects.
        Returns:
        elapsed time in nanoseconds.
        Throws:
        ChooseSorter.EmptyInputException - thrown when unsorted_list is empty.
        ChooseSorter.NoSorterProvided - thrown when Sorter wasn't set before executing this method.
